amendment.description: Amendment authorizes a photovoltaic solar energy commercialization program for the procurement and installation of photovoltaic solar energy systems for electric production in public buildings.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 108-69 to authorize GSA to establish a program for the procurement and installation of photovoltaic solar energy systems for electric production in new and existing public buildings and authorizes $263 million for each fiscal year from 2004 to 2008.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Oberstar amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
